item.title: About
item.description: ok, what’s the first thing that comes to your mind when you visit this website? … ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ not much? well, i’m here to change this bykoga.com is about the great world of design, and how visuals can make or break any idea. whether you're here by accident or just checking out the latest posts, my message is the same: please, welcome aboard this journey. there's cookies and coffee for everybody, so take a seat on this comfy couch of mine as we explore the design world
